item.title: Blogdown, Highcharter and R Markdown
item.description: First Header library("highcharter") ## Highcharts (www.highcharts.com) is a Highsoft software product which is ## not free for commercial and Governmental use data(diamonds, mpg, package = "ggplot2") hchart(mpg, "scatter", hcaes(x = displ, y = hwy, group = class)) {"
